basicInfo.name: Kohkun
basicInfo.flavor: Kohkun's actions during the invasion of Silent Mine earned him the title of \"Commando.\" He now leads a two-Kobold mercenary team and a platoon of orc soldiers.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Axe Swing
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Orc Spirit
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Single Ally
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 23%.
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Boost to 23%.

Passive.name: Tribal Might
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Damage Boost to 20%.

profile.story: Kohkun has been a devoted follower of the Orc King since their tribe arrived in Blazing Desert. He is a fierce warrior with great strength.

basicInfo.name: Kohkun
basicInfo.flavor: Orcs who led raids on Silent Mine were given the title of \"Fighter\" in recognition of their deeds.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Axe Swing
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 220% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 220% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Orc Spirit
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 19%.
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Boost to 19%.

Passive.name: Tribal Might
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Damage Boost to 17%.

profile.story:
Rahkun's right-hand orc.
Fifteen years ago, Kohkun's tribe was driven deep into Silent Mine by Teo.
Back then, Kohkun was sent flying by a stray sword strike from Teo. He survived the encounter because he was knocked out cold.
Kohkun didn't see what happened to the other orcs afterwards, so he doesn't have the same fear of Teo many of his fellow orcs possess.
In the years that followed, Kohkun grew larger and stronger. He urged his fellow orcs to take back their old territory and to expand outside the area surrounding Silent Mine once more.
Noticing his ambition and strength, Rahkun made him his right-hand man.
It's said that Kohkun's axe is a sacred treasure that was able to endure clashing blades with Teo the Orc Slayer.
